mapper.insert: insert into invoice_audit_flow (flow_id, invoice_id, event, user_id, user_type, result_snapshot, update_date) values (#{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{event,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultSnapshot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update invoice_audit_flow set invoice_id = #{invoiceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, event = #{event,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_snapshot = #{resultSnapshot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE} where flow_id = #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select flow_id, invoice_id, event, user_id, user_type, result_snapshot, update_date from invoice_audit_flow
